abstract: NBA releases 2015-2016 schedule, which features more days off between games and fewer back-to-back days.
lead_paragraph: More days off between games have been built in, and the number of games on back-to-back days have been reduced.

headline.main: New N.B.A. Schedule Gives Players More Breaks
headline.print_headline: New Schedule Gives Players More Rest Between Games

snippet: More days off between games have been built in, and the number of games on back-to-back days have been reduced.
